sections.title: Section 1
sections.content:
Dear Hiring Team at Context, 
 
I am thrilled to apply for the Full-Stack Developer Intern position at Context. My expertise in MERN 
stack development, coupled with hands-on experience implementing AI solutions like Retrieval-
Augmented Generation (RAG), aligns perfectly with Context’s mission to revolutionize AI-powered 
learning. 
 
In my role at CoolRiots, I built and optimized AI-driven platforms using React, Node.js, and 
MongoDB, increasing system scalability by 40%. I also integrated OpenAI APIs and LangChain to 
enhance user experiences through intelligent features. These experiences highlight my ability to 
deliver scalable and efficient solutions in dynamic environments. 
 
At Graduate School of Management UIA, I developed a full-stack web application, improving 
response times by 25% and streamlining the user interface for over 1,000 students. I thrive in 
collaborative environments and look forward to contributing to Context’s innovative projects with 
your multidisciplinary team. 
 
I am excited about the opportunity to bring my technical expertise and passion for AI to Context. 
Thank you for considering my application; I look forward to discussing how I can contribu

sections.title: Section 2
sections.content:
te to your 
goals. 
 
Best regards, 
K. M. Zubair
